Text: I can't believe no one has commented on this great upload. Thanks to the author and please encode & upload the rest of the volumes, especially the ones with Curly, vol 1 - 5 I believe. You didn't get the credit that you deserve. This volume is part of the recently remastered, properly restored episodes and is a must have!
Good torrent, thank you much for many healthy hours of fund and laughs.

This is an AWESOME release! As a kid back in the late 60s and early 70s, these guys were on morning noon and night it seemed and we LOVED them! Still do! I always said you could tell if somebody really had a sense of humor by whether they loved and laughed hard at the Stooges. Thanks a BUNCH to the OP and I hope others will seed these indefinitely - I know I will!
